settings.title: Introducing Our New Shelving and Oak Mantel Collection
settings.text: We’re excited to unveil the latest additions to our handcrafted furniture collection, designed to enhance any living space with natural beauty and durability.

settings.overlay_text: Use this section to welcome customers to your store, show off your images or display a promotion

settings.title: Finish
settings.answer: Smooth, planed finish to accentuate the wood’s natural look

settings.title: Customisation
settings.answer: Various lengths to fit your unique space and storage needs

settings.title: New Shelves: Scandinavian Pine
settings.description: Our new shelves are crafted from premium, joinery-grade Scandinavian pine, selected for its resilience and timeless aesthetic. Each shelf is carefully planed to a smooth finish, highlighting the wood's natural grain and beauty. Available in two thickness options - 18mm and 40mm - these shelves offer flexibility to suit various weight capacities and styles, making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens, or any space in need of a touch of elegance and functionality.

settings.overlay_text: Use this section to welcome customers to your store, show off your images or display a promotion

settings.title: Finish
settings.answer: Sawn Rustic finish for a natural, handcrafted appeal

settings.title: Customisation
settings.answer: Multiple dimensions available to fit various spaces and styles

settings.title: New Oak Mantel: Solid Oak with a Rustic Touch
settings.description: Our oak mantelpiece combines the enduring quality of solid oak with a rustic, sawn finish that adds character and warmth to any room. This mantel is crafted from solid oak, showcasing the wood’s authentic grain and texture, with natural imperfections adding charm and uniqueness. Available in a range of lengths, heights, and depths, it’s the perfect addition to complement both traditional and modern interiors.

settings.title: Why Choose Our New Collection?
settings.text:
At Ruby Furniture, our commitment to quality craftsmanship means each piece is built to last, withstanding changes in environment and temperature.

Our Scandinavian Pine and solid oak options offer not only versatility but also the assurance of durability against cupping, splitting, shrinking, and warping.
